entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle changing to periods of rain or drizzle after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
